metaTags.metaDescription: Connect your distributed users, offices, and data centers with our Zero Trust network-as-a-service (NaaS) platform. Learn how Cloudflare approaches SASE.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: What is Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) and what does it do for organizations? Read more in our Learning Center.

psaBanner.text: Cloudflare named a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Enterprise Email Security, Q2 2023.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare One
relatedBlades.subtitle: Secure Access Service Edge
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's SASE, Cloudflare One, is a Zero Trust network-as-a-service platform that dynamically connects users to enterprise resources, with identity-based security controls delivered close to users, wherever they are.
relatedBlades.popupText: The Story of Cloudflare One (20 min)

relatedBlades.title: Fix your cracking corporate perimeter
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare One helps you move away from the old model of network infrastructure — centralized corporate data centers secured by an on-premise network perimeter.

togglesTo.title: How we can help
togglesTo.copy: No more slow VPN and expensive MPLS. Cloudflare helps teams run their corporate network at the edge of the Internet. Our massive network of %{DataCenterCount}+ cities is always close to your users, wherever they are.

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: Make the Internet secure, fast, and reliable for your business

content.value: by combining network connectivity services with Zero Trust security services on a purpose-built global network.
Replace expensive, proprietary circuits with a single global network that provides built-in Zero Trust functionality, DDoS mitigation, network firewalling, and traffic acceleration.

entry_elementLink.elementName: Cloudflare One Product Page - Solutions - Link - Network Services

content.value: Connect users to resources simply and securely with no VPN. Block lateral movement, ransomware, malware, and phishing.

entry_elementLink.elementName: Cloudflare One Product Page - Solutions - Link - Zero Trust Services
entry_elementLink.text: Learn more about Zero Trust Services

features.title: Cloudflare is the only new vendor in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. We believe our recognition validates our commitment to continue advancing our Zero Trust platform to help secure hybrid work.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 Forrester Wave™ for Enterprise Email Security
features.description: Cloudflare tied for the top score in the strategy category, and received the highest scores possible in the criteria of vision and innovation. We believe this recognition highlights our rapid pace of innovation and groundbreaking approach to protecting users and data across all channels.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
features.description: IDC cites Cloudflare's "aggressive product strategy to support enterprise security needs." We believe our recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size get started with Zero Trust and secure access for any user to any resource, without VPNs.

imageAssetFile.title: IDC Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Simple deployment and management
features.description: Every Cloudflare One service runs in every one of our %{DataCenterCount}+ cities around the world. No need to manually integrate multiple point products as you progress to a SASE model.

features.title: Consistent security and speed anywhere on Earth
features.description: Every Cloudflare data center provides single-pass traffic inspection and routing, giving users anywhere on Earth the same protection — without losing speed due to latency or the 'trombone effect.'

features.title: Connects to what you already use
features.description:
Cloudflare runs the world's most powerful, most-peered network, and Cloudflare One supports the identity, endpoint, and cloud providers you already use. Easy to use, integrate once. 

Learn more about [Zero Trust integrations](https://www.cloudflare.com/teams/zero-trust-integrations/) and [network onramps](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-onramp-partners/).

relatedBlades.title: How Cloudflare One works
relatedBlades.copy:
__ZTNA__: Connect any user to any app and private network faster and more securely than a VPN by enforcing identity- and context-based rules. [Explore More >](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/access/)

__CASB__: Visibility and control over SaaS apps to stop data leaks, compliance violations, insider threats, Shadow IT, and risky data sharing. [Read More >](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/casb/)

__SWG__: Block known and unknown Internet threats - and easily control data flows - by enforcing DNS, HTTP, network, and browser isolation rules. [Learn More >](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/gateway/)

- More threat protection using email security and DNS filtering.
- More data protection using [remote browser isolation](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-browser-isolation/) and DLP.
- More [access control](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-access-control/) using identity proxy and device posture.

statsFeatures.description: Reduce the deployment time for new users, locations, apps and devices as well as reduce attack surface and shorten remediation times by as much as 95%
Lower TCO and accelerate your business by consolidating up to 10 point products into one platform
Onboard new employees and contractors up to 60% faster when you connect users to resources through Cloudflare instead of a VPN

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare's Zero-Trust service called Cloudflare One is top-notch and has helped protect our network from several attacks. Working with this vendor has been an absolute pleasure, they were there every step of the way understanding our needs and working with us to develop a global solution."

quoteCarousel.quote: "[Cloudflare One] definitely feels like a category definer, if not creator. The amount of innovation produced since the initial announcement in 2020 is nothing short of incredible."

"We had already deployed Zscaler but were recommended Cloudflare One, and after much due diligence and benchmarking against our current provider and others, we opted for Cloudflare One and couldn't have been happier. Experience to date has been more than positive."

"We have been using Cloudflare One a lot and it's an all-in-one powerful service. Cloudflare Global Network makes our applications always available and Zero Trust service makes them protected, acting as an excellent alternative to our VPN."

features.title: Cloudflare One at a glance
features.description: This brief summarizes Cloudflare One, which combines Zero Trust security with WAN-as-a-Service, firewall, and more on a single, unified global network.

features.title: Getting Started with SASE
features.description: Learn what Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) is, how it secures your network, and how Cloudflare delivers SASE with Cloudflare One.

features.description: Illustrative examples of transformation and common technical use cases for how to  simplify and strengthen your network and security architecture.

features.title: Availability and buying options
features.description: In-depth research from Enterprise Management Associates (EMA) reviews packaging, pricing, and security capabilities of nine SASE vendors, including Cloudflare.

features.title: Updates from Cloudflare One Week 2022 (June 19-24)
features.description: Learn about best practices and new Zero Trust capabilities to accelerate your security modernization.

features.title: SASE Brief
features.description: Learn more about Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) with takeaways on common obstacles, composability as an important factor in evaluating vendors, and reasons why customers choose Cloudflare One for their SASE journey.

features.title: Security Services Edge (SSE)
features.description: For organizations exploring SSE, a conceptual model to consolidate point solutions and deliver unified security in the cloud.

features.title: Cloudflare vs. Zscaler
features.description: Cloudflare's simple deployment, network resiliency, and quick innovation provide a stronger foundation for true transformation of networking, security, and applications.

imageAssetFile.title: Zscaler vs Cloudflare hero image: transformation

features.title: Foundational concepts: Zero Trust, SASE and SSE
features.description: Understand the Zero Trust, SASE and SSE capabilities included in the Cloudflare One platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Zero Trust, SASE and SSE
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust, SASE and SSE Image

features.title: What is Zero Trust?
features.description: Learn more about the technologies and principles behind the Zero Trust security model.

relatedBlades.quote: "OneTrust relies on Cloudflare to maintain our network perimeter, so we can focus on delivering technology that helps our customers be more trusted. With Cloudflare, we can easily build context-aware Zero Trust policies for secure access to our developer tools. Employees can connect to the tools they need so simply teams don't even know Cloudflare is powering the backend. It just works."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Microsoft Azure is committed to offering services that make it easy to use offerings from industry leaders like Cloudflare - enabling choice to address customer's business need."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Partner Group Program Manager for Azure Networking

quoteCarousel.quote: "WAN architectures that offer a global scale, integrated enterprise network security functions, and direct, secure connectivity to remote users are key to organizations looking to increase their operational agility and lower total costs of ownership."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: IDC Research VP, WW Telecom, Virtualization & CDN

quoteCarousel.quote: "VMware SD-WAN virtualizes the WAN to decouple network software services from the underlying hardware—providing agility and performance for all enterprises and is a foundational component of the VMware Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) platform. VMware and Cloudflare share a vision to provide customers a cost-effective, turnkey, and more secure Global WAN."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: VP Products, SD-WAN and SASE business, VMware

quoteCarousel.quote: "[We] are pleased to collaborate with Cloudflare to develop solutions that will enable our customers to easily deploy the Aruba EdgeConnect SD-WAN platform, acquired with Silver Peak, as the enterprise connectivity onramp to Cloudflare One."
